function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large-scale data collection and sharing may lead to potential privacy breaches and data security risks.","Impact":"Exposure of sensitive patient information, leading to privacy violations and potential misuse of personal data.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data anonymization protocols and data security measures, as well as compliance with data protection regulations such as GDPR and HIPAA.","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization tools, secure data transfer protocols, and access control mechanisms.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and individuals whose data is being collected and shared.","Owner":"Data custodians, IT security professionals, and regulatory bodies."},{"Description":"Disproportionate morbidity and mortality of specific ethnic populations increases the risk of social and healthcare inequalities.","Impact":"Widening disparities in healthcare access, treatment outcomes, and public health outcomes, leading to systemic injustices and negative health impacts for affected communities.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted healthcare interventions, increase access to healthcare services, and address social determinants of health to reduce health disparities.","Technologies":"Healthcare analytics, community health programs, and social support systems.","People":"Black and Asian populations, marginalized communities, and healthcare providers serving these populations.","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare organizations, and government bodies."},{"Description":"Collaborative data sharing across multiple countries may lead to cross-border legal and regulatory challenges.","Impact":"Conflicting data governance frameworks, legal complexities, and jurisdictional issues, leading to hurdles in data access, usage, and compliance.","Mitigation":"Establish standardized data sharing agreements, align with international data protection laws, and engage in diplomatic discussions to resolve cross-border legal challenges.","Technologies":"Cross-border data governance platforms, legal interoperability frameworks, and international data sharing protocols.","People":"Research consortiums, legal experts, and government authorities involved in data governance.","Owner":"International organizations, legal entities, and diplomatic representatives."}]}
